issue.title: [CF 1188] Tick marks on bars tracking DoT debuffs
issue.body:
Would it be possible to get bar groups to display tick marks on icons showing DoT debuffs?

Not sure how easy it is to get tick information out of the WoW combat log events, but multiple other DoT-tracking addons are capable of it so maybe there's a simple way.


> Posted by CurseForge user nandchan | Imported from CurseForge issue #1188 | Raw
